extDescription.message: Chrome Extension to track the capital gain of the shares within the "We Share" operation.

sharesValueLabel.description: Name of the label for the value of the share.

sharesValueTitle.description: Tooltip for the share value input.

investmentValueLabel.description: Name of the label for the value of the investment.

investmentValueTitle.description: Tooltip for the value of the investment.

capitalGainLabel.description: Name of the label for the value of the capital gain.

capitalGainTitle.description: Tooltip for the capital gain input.

overallGainLabel.description: Name of the label for the value of the overall capital gain.

overallGainTitle.description: Tooltip for the overall gain input.

numberOfSharesPurchasedLabel.description: Name of the label for the number of shares purchased.

numberOfSharesPurchasedTitle.description: Tooltip for the number of shares purchased.

numberOfSharesAcquiredLabel.description: Name of the label for the number of shares acquired.

numberOfSharesAcquiredTitle.description: Tooltip for the number of shares acquired.

buyingPriceLabel.description: Name of the label for the buying price.

amountOfInvestmentLabel.description: Name of the label for the amount of investment.

amountOfInvestmentTitle.description: Tooltip for the amount of investment.

showOverallGainOnBadgeLabel.message: Show the overall gain instead of the capital gain on the icon.
showOverallGainOnBadgeLabel.description: Name of the label of the option to show the overall gain instead of the capital gain on the icon.

amundiAccountTabLabel.description: Name of the Amundi account tab.

amundiAccess.description: Name of the amundi account access button.

reviews.message: Rate this extension on the Chrome Web Store
reviews.description: Link message for the Chrome Web Store reviews page.

closeModal.description: Label for the modal's close button.

numberOfUsers.description: Label for the number of users.
